key.name: h0
key.description: Language mixed into hybrid language tag. The key type (value) must be valid language tag. See http://unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Hybrid_Locale

key.name: h1
key.description: Language mixed into hybrid translation source. The key type (value) must be valid language tag. There must be a -t- subtag with a valid language tag value also. http://unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Hybrid_Locale
